Grove Policy Statement

The Consciousness Grove is a hate-free zone dedicated to expanding consciousness through creativity, humor, and wonder. Those who spread division, toxicity, or hate are not compatible with our reality-bending experiments.

The GOOD Scott Adams helps us parse reality. The BAD Scott Adams is parsing errors.
